Welcome to EasyWRF’s documentation!¶

Plotting Library for wrfout files.

author: Lukas Kugler date: 03-11-2017

Major bug: - PRIORITY LOW kommt nicht zurecht, wenn nur ein wrfout file im ordner liegt!

class EasyWRF.Load_Domain(WRFout_data_directory, domainname='MyDomain', coast=True, river=False, austrianborders=True, bezirk=True)¶

HIGH LEVEL THING

from myWRF_plotlib import wrfout_plotter

ThisWRF = wrfout_plotter.Load_Domain(‘./wrfout_dir/’, ‘DomainName’)

ThisWRF.plot_hgt() # single image ThisWRF.plot2Dvar(‘OLR’) # OLR images for all times

load_WRFout_data(WRFout_data_directory)¶

Load wrfout files from given directory into list of Datasets.

plot2D_derived(var='TE')¶

Simple to use routine for plotting derived variable from available list: ‘TE’ (Total Energy),

### Example: wrfpath = ‘./’ ThisWRF = wrfout.Load_Domain(wrfpath, domainname=’CEUR’)

ThisWRF.plot2D_derived(var=’TE’)

plot2Dvar(wrfout_variable)¶

Simple to use routine for plotting builtin wrfout variable

### Example: wrfpath = ‘./’ ThisWRF = wrfout.Load_Domain(wrfpath, domainname=’CEUR’)

ThisWRF.plot2Dvar(‘OLR’)
